subject: College Athletics
Basketball
Women
lead_paragraph: Geno Auriemma versus Jim Calhoun has been among the rarest of intercollegiate role reversals, a men’s program deservedly held to a standard established by women.
snippet: Geno Auriemma versus Jim Calhoun has been among the rarest of intercollegiate role reversals, a men’s program deservedly held to a standard established by women.
